mapper.select: SELECT A.C_CrateCode, A.C_Condition, A.C_Create_Date, A.C_Production_LotNo, B.CL_ItemCode C_ItemCode FROM Crate_tbl A left outer join Crate_Lot_tbl B on A.C_Production_LotNo = B.CL_LotNo where A.C_CrateCode = #{CrateCode} and A.C_Condition = #{Condition}

SELECT A.C_CrateCode, A.C_Condition, A.C_Create_Date, A.C_Production_LotNo, B.CL_MachineCode C_MachineCode, B.CL_Qty C_Qty FROM Crate_tbl A inner join Crate_Lot_tbl B on A.C_Production_LotNo = B.CL_LotNo and B.CL_MachineCode = #{machineCode} where A.C_Condition = #{condition}
SELECT concat('N', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y%m%d'), #{C_LotNo}, lpad(count(*)+1, 4, 0)) FROM Crate_tbl where C_Create_Date > current_date();
